faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template includes 4 blank DIY monthly templates specifically for customization, plus the flexible structure allows you to modify layouts and add personal touches throughout.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with standard Notion features and doesn't require any AI subscription or advanced Notion plan.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, all dates have been updated for 2026, and the template is designed to work year after year with easy date adjustments for future years.
